Author: Nik Blockchain.aero
Title: [ANN] BLOCKCHAIN.AERO: Proof-of-flight. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Sorry that it happened. A small part of the emails of those who also received our letter were notable. This is an accident, and we are already using systems that will prevent this in the future.  Taking this opportunity, we want to say that we are very inspired by the rapid development of the project. We conduct communication and hold presentations — with a large municipal formation, with several car factories in China, with you, dear community members.  Real-estate developers want to equip the vertipods, investors — to secure the vehicles and become flight-providers into the network, economists — to assess the exact parameters of the circulation dynamics of this new value.  We will keep you informed, do everything as quickly and correctly as possible.

Author: tyrionu
Title: [ANN] BLOCKCHAIN.AERO: Proof-of-flight. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Hi, I'm from aerospace industry and from what I learned McFly ICO is complete SCAM technology and legislation wise. What they promise (based on aerodynamically and technically completely unrealistic 3D model which can no way safely fly) is not only impossible to reach till 2019 in tech terms but now way will legislation allow any type of flying cars that fast... Think about it... To invest I would at least likke to hear technical specs of this "flying car" e.g. motor output, power source, drag factor, or see flight of at least scale model. Nothing of it though in their white paper just vague promises of flying cars revolution...

Author: SirGeekalot
Title: [ANN] BLOCKCHAIN.AERO: Proof-of-flight. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Hi! We welcome substantiated opinions but this one simply is not.  Firstly, all the tech specs mentioned above are on Bartini website already. Check it out — http://bartini.aero  Secondly, the success of McFly.aero does not depend on any single flying car design. Blockchain.aero consortium already has 2 aircraft developers and open for more to join.  Thirdly, the Bartini company has recently been approached by a blackmailer who called himself Valery from Kharkiv, Ukraine, who demanded to reveal the in-depth technical know-how for his “inspection” or else he will “tell everyone you are scam”. Some things have to stay in labs as yet. Sorry, Valeriy.  Yet again. The good news is that McFly.aero and Blockchain.aero is the supply chain for all flying cars, not only Bartini. This is the the IoT decentralized marketplace to reward all devices that orchestrate flight in the city.

Author: Nik Blockchain.aero
Title: [ANN] BLOCKCHAIN.AERO: Proof-of-flight. Token Launch Phase I
Body: We will use McFly tokens on Waves and Ethereum as an equivalent of McFly tokens on our Blockchain.aero blockchain.  Technical specs and performance of Blockchain.aero blockchain wouldn't be possible at Waves or Ethereum. That's why shall make own blockchain or use the 3rd party solution (not Waves, nor Ethereum) if it matches our requirements.  The plan is to migrate tokens and exchange it equally from Waves to Ethereum and then to Blockchain.aero (own one or some-blockchain-based).  Now McFly is used mainly as a fuel for the project. Then it will be used as a fuel for flying cars. Here's our roadmap for our tokenization and blockchain development:  2017 3,000 of Bartini vehicles are tokenized by McFly tokens  Cross-industrial workgroup for the business and technological requirements for the blockchain.aero core blockchain established  2018 10,000 of Bartini vehicles are tokenized by McFly tokens  Alpha version of the blockchain.aero’s custom blockchain for the urban mass aviation Application layer and APIs become available, first mobile apps are tested  2019 30,000 of Bartini vehicles are tokenized by McFly tokens  Test flights using McFly tokens to measure system’s lifetime and load  2020 7,000 of Bartini vehicles are tokenized by McFly tokens  Entire fleets are operated through blockchain

More information about the structure of the tokens will be available today on the updated blockchain.aero website.

Author: Nik Blockchain.aero
Title: [ANN] BLOCKCHAIN.AERO: Proof-of-flight. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Welcome to McFly Team! 🚀  Our task is to make arrangements for the new way of intra-city commute — by air. The first city to deploy a blockchain-based network of air taxi is preparing to do so by 2020.  By now McFly Team is proud to include 63 cities from 25 countries. We communicate in English. We welcome translations to local languages by our community members.  Look up our questionnaire to understand what you can contribute: 👇🏻📋 https://blockchainaero.typeform.com/to/gVs89g  This year thousands of new experts in blockchain emerge all over the world. Next year we’ll have thousands of new experts in urban mobility. You can be one of them!  Fill in the questionnaire to join McFly Team and get 10 minutes of flight in an air taxi. Bitcoin is virtual but flight is real! 1 McFly token = 1 min. of flight! 🔝  Our project launched on Waves 🏄 platform: AssetID of McFly token is verified and has a green checkmark✅ AssetID: 7EHVUjcgEV9Du8qp95tS1eBV8DFtenmX64H3QawdCkC4

Author: Nik Blockchain.aero
Title: [ANN] BLOCKCHAIN.AERO: Proof-of-flight. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Thanks a lot for your question. McFly token is flight itself. Flying cars fly on tokens, like ordinary cars burn gasoline. Open algorithms calculate price of the flight, life cycle and service charges of the vehicle. McFly token forms a new OSS/BSS (operation support and business support) systems. We are not sure it would look appropriate if we copy-paste the white paper here. The paper provides specifications. Hope this helps, please let us know if you would have more questions.

Body: This is actually a 1.2-2 trillion USD market that develops quite fast. Just google "flying cars" and one of the most recent news would be that Dubai is already preparing to deploy a network, and slightly earlier — that Uber announced they may need over 100 Bn USD worth of flying cars during 2020-2022.  Here you can read more about blockchain.aero. http://sk.ru/news/b/articles/archive/2017/08/03/flying-cars-ready-to-take-to-moscow_1920_s-skies.aspx  It is our task is to make flights affordable in a decentralised community-driven flight-sharing system.

Author: Nik Blockchain.aero
Title: [ANN] BLOCKCHAIN.AERO: Proof-of-flight. Token Launch Phase I
Body: Yesterday we launched McFly Token Airdrop by distributing our invitation tokens among Waves community members. By the moment Waves holders received more than 30 000 McFlys, it's about a half of the planned amount. However, our airdrop accidentally caused delays in Waves blockchain.  Naturally, we didn't expect such outcome.  We are very thankful to the Waves team for their platform that allowed us to start our Token Launch! We met with Sasha Ivanov in June to tell about our project. Alas, we were not granted a chance to meet with him again to discuss our plan for the Airdrop and other Token Launch details, which may explain why Waves blockchain performance caught us unawares.  We heard that the Waves team is busy implementing Bitcoin-NG protocol to handle 100 transactions per second instead of per minute. This will definitely protect the Waves network from massive airdrops like ours. Meanwhile, we're updating our distribution script to adjust it to the current Waves blockchain capacity.  We will continue to send our tokens to Waves holders, but at a slower pace (1 transaction per 1 second). Each holder with at least a "cent" of WAVES will get 1 McFly token which roughly equals to 1 minute of flight.  If, for some reason, you did not receive a McFly token on your Waves wallet, then send us the address of your wallet at info@blockchain.aero and we will bring it to you.
